subject: Table Tennis
lead_paragraph: China, the defending champion, beat Germany, 3-1, to win the men’s title at the table tennis team world championships in Tokyo. China also won the women’s event, 3-0, over Japan.
snippet: China, the defending champion, beat Germany, 3-1, to win the men’s title at the table tennis team world championships in Tokyo. China also won the women’s event, 3-0, over Japan.
